evolvepy.generator.mutation.binary_mutation module¶

evolvepy.generator.mutation.binary_mutation.bit_mutation(chromossome: Union[int, float, complex, str, bytes, numpy.generic, Sequence[Union[int, float, complex, str, bytes, numpy.generic]], Sequence[Sequence[Any]], numpy.typing._array_like._SupportsArray], existence_rate: float, gene_rate: float, mutation_range: Tuple[float, float])¶

it takes a number n of genes and randomicaly change n gene bits in a chromossome. If gener_rate = 1 this mutaions behaves like a flipbit mutation, else it is a bitstring mutaion
